channel.title: Adding commands to quest tab
channel.description: alright... i want to know how to make it so i can click on my quest tab and then i will have the option to click on a command and then the command will activate. I know howw to add the name to the list but i dont know how to activate the command... any suggestions? I am using Hippiescape V2 as a Base Server
